_description: Against over-wandering friars, with music ‘quod Raff Drake’ — seven quatrains

BLRoyApp58.First Lines:
ffrere gastkyn wo þou bequi manes hic in
                    patria…
BLRoyApp58.Last Lines: …for all shuche freres schold byde at home

Rimbault,  Edward Francis. 
             A Little Book of Songs and Ballads.
         London: J. R. Smith, 1851: 35.
Flügel,  Ewald.

                VIII.” 
             Anglia
         12 (1889): 225-72, 585-97: 268.
